content: In Black Myth: Wukong, you'll control the Destined One as you explore various treacherous regions divided by chapters, with several sub-regions linked by the Keeper's Shrines, and guarded by fierce Yaoguai Chief Minibosses, and Yaoguai King Bosses. Each area boasts secrets a plenty, and may also contain friendly characters, new gear and treasure, and secret boss fights.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Myth_Wukong_Guide.md', within the main section titled 'Black Myth: Wukong Wiki Sections', specifically from the subsection 'Walkthrough'.
The content is as follows:
In Black Myth: Wukong, you'll control the Destined One as you explore various treacherous regions divided by chapters, with several sub-regions linked by the Keeper's Shrines, and guarded by fierce Yaoguai Chief Minibosses, and Yaoguai King Bosses. Each area boasts secrets a plenty, and may also contain friendly characters, new gear and treasure, and secret boss fights.
